summary: Build a single-page responsive thought leadership portfolio website (ShiBhu) for Shivasankari Bhuvaneswaran, featuring published articles, core expertise, career overview stats, and an about section.
architectural_notes: Static single-page site built with HTML + CSS (no JS), including responsive design and sticky top navigation with in-page anchors.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page responsive portfolio website for “ShiBhu - Thought Leadership Portfolio” that matches the structure and content from the provided HTML (header, sticky navigation, Articles, Expertise, Career Overview/Stats, About, Footer).

Implement the Header section with the provided content: name “Shivasankari Bhuvaneswaran”, tagline, and the five expertise tags (Global Capability Centers, Marketplace Platforms, Finance & Risk, Technology Leadership, Telecom Strategy) displayed as pills.
Implement a sticky top Navigation bar with links: Articles, Expertise, Portfolio (anchors to #stats), About, styled as a light bar with hover accent behavior.
Implement the Articles section with categorized groups and responsive article-card grid; each card must include title, platform badge, date, description, and an outbound link that opens in a new tab.
Implement the Core Expertise section as a responsive grid of expertise items with the provided titles and descriptions.
Implement the Career Overview/Stats section with the four provided stats (700+ Published Articles, 50+ Publication Platforms, 9 Expertise Domains, 12 Years Experience) in a responsive grid.
Implement the About section with the provided two-paragraph bio text, centered and constrained to a readable width.
Implement the Footer with the provided copyright line and “Portfolio Last Updated: February 15, 2026”.

Establish a coherent visual theme using Tailwind CSS inspired by the provided HTML/CSS (dark hero gradient, off-white surfaces, light-gray section backgrounds, subtle borders, and a single accent color similar to #0066cc) and apply it consistently across typography, spacing, cards, and section dividers. Do not use a blue+purple dual theme.

Update the hero header H1 text at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[2]/h1[1] to display exactly “ShiBhu” (replacing the current text “Shivasankari Bhuvaneswaran”), without changing any other header content or styling.
